section.section: The Department may make Program loans for housing on terms that the Department considers necessary to make the housing affordable to families of limited income.

text.section:
Within the maximum income limits for families of limited income, the Secretary may establish:
lower income ranges;
interest rates to be available on Program loans serving occupants with incomes within those lower ranges; and
any preference or reservation of money for applications for Program loans to finance housing to serve occupants in those lower income ranges.
